name: Astonishing Fire Combat: Open Tank Civil War
name_original: Astonishing Fire Combat: Open Tank Civil War
description:
Drive through the war situation, destruction, bombing and heavy machine gun’s banging sounds are everywhere in the town, you have war held very close to your place, Army camps have been setup to rescue the survivors of this civil war, people are wounded and places, building are on fire, it is not at all safe in here anymore. You have to take a step ahead, move on and get the best tanks in this Astonishing Fire Combat: Open Tank Civil War game to hit the enemies who have left your place so devastated. Troops are marching in their assault suits all over, taking rounds of the populated areas, and the head commissioner calls the commando team that you are leading to operate this mission out of town, because tanks have a very strong bombing ability, they can blow an entire town or village with a single bomb, and the one you are riding has an entirely different features, they have latest system installed to let pass about any obstacle your way, new changed paths, walk over bricks, or any hard material, in ways where roads are not smooth.

Target, attack, bomb, shoot and do whatever it takes to knock down those creepy monster enemies, you are launched on this mission, now, come back with the fury of pride and victory. Have a good and perfect aiming on the targets you have got in front of you.
